nodes.name: execute

execute(address[],uint256[],bytes[],byte.details: Anyone can execute this but only transactions signed by master or actor (if valid method) are accepted

params._data: (bytes[]) Array of ABI encoded transaction data
params._dataHashSignature: (bytes[]) Array of transaction signatures for the respective transaction data
params._value: (uint256[]) Array of wei amounts being sent in the respective transactions

execute(address[],uint256[],bytes[],byte.return: (bool) returns true if all transactions in the batch succeeded

params._raw: (bytes32) keccak256 hash of the ABI encoded transaction data

getSigner(bytes32,bytes).return: signer (address) the EOA that signed the data

params._data: (bytes) data being send in the transaction
params._sig: (bytes) the signature of the transaction data
